conformance.rmi
Class StubTest

java.lang.Object
  test.Test
      conformance.rmi.StubTest

public class StubTest
extends Test

Performs basic tests on the public interface of Stub.

These tests are best performed after SkeletonTest.

The tests performed are:

  • Stubs cannot be created for classes.
  • Stubs cannot be created for non-remote interfaces.
  • Stubs cannot be created with null arguments to Stub.create.
  • Stubs connect to the address with which they are created.
  • Stubs correctly implement equals and hashCode.
  • Stubs implement the toString method.

ensureUnknownHostRejected

private void ensureUnknownHostRejected()
                                throws TestFailed
Ensures that a stub cannot be created from a skeleton whose address has not been determined.

This method should be used before the test skeleton is started.

Throws:
TestFailed - If IllegalStateException is not thrown.

ensureNullPointerExceptions

private void ensureNullPointerExceptions()
                                  throws TestFailed
Ensures that both Stub.create methods throw NullPointerException when given null for any parameters.

Throws:
TestFailed - If null is given as a parameter but the correct exception is not thrown.

ensureLocalMethods

private void ensureLocalMethods()
                         throws TestFailed
Ensures that stubs for the same skeleton are equal and have the same hash code, and stubs have a string representation.

Throws:
TestFailed - If the test fails.
